definition: to sustain/to bear the weight (of the upper storeys in architecture)/load-bearing
surname Cheng/Cheng (c. 2000 BC), third of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to bear/to carry/to hold/to continue/to undertake/to take charge/owing to/due to/to receive
eldest grandson (to sustain upper storeys of ancestor worship)

sentences.english: Vertical or horizontal layout, full load-bearing steel frame design.
sentences.chinese: 立式或臥式佈置，全承重鋼架設計。

sentences.english: If we drill holes in strategic locations, we compromise the load-carrying capacity of the wall。
sentences.chinese: 如果我們在關鍵位置鑽孔，牆的承重強度就會降低。

sentences.english: Some specific works are made in load-bearing masonry.
sentences.chinese: 一些具體的部位建立在承重砌體基礎上。

sentences.english: The cast iron rod bushing provides maximum load bearing support.
sentences.chinese: 鑄鐵連桿襯套提供最大承重的支持。

sentences.english: By doing this, it takes the carabiner completely out of the system, leaving the load on the keeper.
sentences.chinese: 這樣做會導致主鎖完全脫離系統，讓膠套完全承重。

sentences.english: The girth on top of the wall is reinforced.
sentences.chinese: 承重牆頂部的圈樑需加固。

sentences.english: Abdominal exercises should be crunches, reverse crunches, and oblique twists with weights.
sentences.chinese: 腹部練習包括前曲伸，翻轉屈伸和承重側扭曲。

sentences.english: Non load-bearing partitions are often built of lightweight materials.
sentences.chinese: 非承重隔牆一般採用輕質材料建造。

sentences.english: Not allowed to put weight on my leg for eight weeks, I wobbled about on crutches.
sentences.chinese: 爲了不讓受傷的腿承重，我拄柺杖拄了8個星期。

sentences.english: Some two-story dwellings have interior load bearing walls.
sentences.chinese: 某些兩層的住房，裏面有着承重牆。

sentences.english: Thus, the proper timing related to loading the inside ski has to be mastered in a free skiing first.
sentences.chinese: 因此，應該先在自由滑當中熟練掌握內板承重的時機。

sentences.english: When a load is being applied, the loading bar shall be in contact with the full width of the specimen.
sentences.chinese: 在負載狀態下時，承重條應能和試件全寬貼合。

sentences.english: Site may prove wall body without the affirmation of prefabricated struts is main wall.
sentences.chinese: 身體沒有地點可以證明牆預製支柱形狀的肯定承重牆。

sentences.english: What is the max. load for this rack system ? 100lbs.
sentences.chinese: 這個軌道系統的最大承重是多少？

sentences.english: On top of the concrete foundation a 600mm thick load-bearing wall is erected.
sentences.chinese: 混凝土基礎以上便是60Omm厚的毛石承重牆體。

sentences.english: The cabinet adopts frame structure, with 800KG static load.
sentences.chinese: 機櫃採用框架結構，靜載承重達800KG。

definition: to support/to bear the weight of (a building)
a building/the frame of a building/roof beam/truss
floor/floor (ie. metal plate, concrete slab, wooden planking etc)
a boom (i.e. transverse beam for hanging objects)
